doc:
Harry A. Pollard https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Harry_A._Pollard 0 Harry A. Pollard (January 23, 1879, Republic City, Kansas – July 6, 1934, Pasadena California) was an American silent film actor and director. His wife was silent screen star Margarita Fischer. Harry_A._Pollard ( January_23 , 1879 , Republic_City , Kansas – July_6_,_1934 , Pasadena_California ) was an_American_silent_film_actor_and_director . His_wife was silent_screen_star_Margarita_Fischer .
